Song.title: Everlasting
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Eric Hughes and Aaron Baird Â© 1999 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: E A | C#m B4 :||]
Verse 1: Oh [E]God, our Red[B]eemer, Our [A]Savior, our [B7sus]Friend Cre[E]ator of the [B]universe Your [A]goodness knows no [Bsus B]end
Bridge: And our [E]voices join with the [A]thousands who Know [F#m7]mercy because of the [Bsus B]cross All [E]sinners washed in your [F#m7]precious blood For[A]ever we will [Bsus B]sing
Chorus: From [E]everlasting to [F#m7]everlasting,{,} [A]praise be to [Bsus B]You From [E]everlasting to [F#m7]everlasting,{,} [A]praise be to [Bsus B]You Oh [||:E A | C#m B4 :||]God
Verse 2: Oh [E]God, our Del[B]iverer And [A]Lord of all [B7sus]grace How [E]can I stand in [B]silence When the [A]heavens sing Your [Bsus B]praise?[(to bridge)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 oh god our redeemer our savior our friend creator of the universe your goodness knows no end bridge and our voices join with the thousands who know mercy because of the cross all sinners washed in your precious blood forever we will sing chorus from everlasting to everlasting praise be to you from everlasting to everlasting praise be to you oh god verse 2 oh god our deliverer and lord of all grace how can i stand in silence when the heavens sing your praise
